text: the determination or desire to do something
to forget or choose not to take something with you when you go away from a place
to keep something or someone in a specific condition or position
a period of time when someone is allowed to be away from their job
an opportunity for someone to do something
something used to count a score in a game, match, etc.
an idea that you want others to understand and accept
to move your finger or something in your hand in the direction you want someone to look
